title: Per capita U.S. Real Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) 1990 to 2019
yAxis: Per capita Real GDP in chained (2012) U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Per capita Real GDP in chained (2012) U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Per capita Real GDP in chained (2012) U.S. dollars is roughly constant from '07 to '19, gradually decreasing from '19 to '90, and finally roughly constant from '90 to '91.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year '19 and '90.
The highest Per capita Real GDP in chained (2012) U.S. dollars, of value 58055.0 was reached at Year '19
Minimum Per capita Real GDP in chained (2012) U.S. dollars about 36900.0 was reached at Year '91
min_summary: In general Per capita Real GDP in chained (2012) U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
